[MY PREVIOUS ACTION - Turn 108]
Reasoning: **Exploring card options**

I'm thinking about getting suit conversions or enhancements, which could be valuable for upcoming boss encounters. Rerolls are currently at $1, and with $5, I could reroll several times to seek strong jokers. However, these rerolls only apply to the card section, not boosters. Right now, I only have Smiley, and it might be better to reroll first for a better joker. I also need to consider the potential of buying an Arcana pack. I'm weighing the risks of boss debuffs too!
**Considering boss strategy**

In Balatro, I now realize that The Goad debuffs all Spades, which means they won't score and won't trigger Ancient abilities. So, it’s crucial to have enough hearts, diamonds, and clubs to play five scoring cards. Since my deck has more hearts (15), diamonds (12), clubs (9), and spades (9), I can discard the spades. Although discards may be limited during the boss fight, I think using the $5 to buy an Arcana pack to strengthen my deck could be the best option!
**Clarifying tarot mechanics**

I'm thinking about how tarot cards work in the game. Some are for immediate use, while others need you to select a card from your hand. In the shop, the Arcana pack lets you pick one tarot from three options, but if it requires targets, I wouldn't have a hand at that moment. Yet, in-game, you can select cards for those tarots. So, I can buy the booster now and then choose my tarot and targets in my next turn. That sounds like a solid plan!
**Evaluating reroll options**

I'm pondering whether to reroll in the shop for $1 to find another joker or planet since we already have a strong run. There's a leveled-up Mercury for my pair, and getting more Mercuries could boost it even further. Rerolling might yield Mercury since the planet merchant increases frequency. With $5, I could reroll a few times, aiming for a good planet or joker, while still considering the option to buy Arcana or Smiley. That seems like a balanced approach!
**Deciding on spending strategy**

I need to be careful not to exceed my funds as I prepare to face the boss. My immediate priority is to improve my scoring. Rerolling could help me find a better joker than Smiley, but powerful jokers are pricey, and right now I only have $5. Selling a joker might increase my funds, but I’m hesitant to lose core cards like Ancients. 

Instead, I'm leaning toward rerolling to find Mercury or a decent joker while keeping enough for an Arcana pack if necessary. I’ll reroll now, and if I like what I see, I can buy Mercury and use it to boost my pair!

This could impact my base chips and scoring dynamics. With splash mechanics, every played card seems to contribute to scoring, which is crucial to remember.
**Clarifying scoring rules**

So, it looks like the rule about the highest hand is overridden. All selected cards score their chips and any effects, no matter their hand type. This means all five cards will count, even if they're not in the hand. For a straight, all five cards contribute regardless of any splash mechanic. # Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
